name: Dream
description:
Calligraphy is a method in modern Iranian painting and contemporary calligraphy that was gradually formed by some Iranian calligraphers and painters in the 1930s and 1940s and has continued its life in the field of contemporary art. It has also found followers in many countries in the region. They used a combination of calligraphy and painting, so this method is sometimes called calligraphy and calligraphy.

The roots of calligraphy can be seen in the entertaining methods of Iranian calligraphy such as simultaneous calligraphy, reverse calligraphy, machine gun calligraphy, monogram, etc. But it can be said that the Saqakhaneh school in contemporary Iranian painting has been the main origin of contemporary aesthetics and innovation in calligraphy and the emergence of calligraphy. In the post-revolutionary period, calligraphy was very popular among young people. They competed in various fields, whether traditional methods or trying to create new creations. In this field, the process of calligraphy also witnessed different and extensive experiences.
